name: Frog
overview: Frog is a 1-player Frogger clone for the VIC-20. The player attempts to navigate a frog across a busy highway and a river while avoiding being hit by cars or falling into the water. The player starts with 3 lives, and moves in the cardinal directions. Cars and logs move horizontally across the screen, and turtles only stay on the surface a short period of time. If all 6 zones at the top of the screen are filled, the player advances to a more difficult level.
